籤詩版本二:
Tausasawa ta kasance mai nasara a kan ƙarfi tun zamanin da, kuma ƙofar ayyukan alheri tana da wadata.
Idan wani ya duba wannan hexagram, zai zama kamar saduwa da Yaojing lokacin da kuke jin ƙishirwa.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta alheri da tawali'u.
A cikin komai, jituwa shine al'ada.
解曰: Sama da ƙasa suna da ji. Gaskiya ne sosai. Allah da Buddha suna kare ku. Kar ka manta da abin da ka samu.
籤詩故事一:
◇Renzong ya gane mahaifiyarsa
Ƙwarƙwarar Song Zhenzong, Ƙwarƙwarar Liu, ta yi kishin ƙwarƙwarar Li ta haifi ɗa, Zhao Zhen, kuma ta ba wa ungozoma cin hanci don maye gurbin ɗan ƙwarƙwarar Li da kyan gani mai fata. fadar mai sanyi.An iya nada kuyangar Liu don daga baya.
Bayan da ƙwarƙwarar De ta zama sarauniya, Ƙwarƙwarar De ta kunna wuta a fadar mai sanyi kuma ta yi niyya ta kashe ƙwarƙwarar Li.
Da farko kuyanga Li ta jefa Zhao Zhen a cikin kogin, amma an yi sa'a, eunuch ya cece shi, ya aika zuwa fadar sarakuna takwas, da ya girma, ya gaji Song Renzong.
Daga baya, Bao Zheng (Bao Qingtian) ya gana da kuyangiyar makauniyar Li, da gangan, bayan da ya koyi gaskiya, ya yi bincike sosai kan lamarin, kuma a karshe gaskiya ta fito fili, kuma mahaifiyar Song Renzong da Concubine Li da mahaifiyarta sun gane juna. An jefa ƙwarƙwara Liu a cikin fada mai sanyi sannan aka yi maraba da kuyangar Li a fadar, labarin ya ƙare cikin nasara.
聖意: Gida da gida albarka ne ga kai, ga dukiya, ga kasuwanci, ga aure, ga aure, ga matafiya maza, ga toshe gonaki, ga tsutsotsin siliki, ga kaka, ga dabbobi shida, ga dabbobi shida, ga samun mutane, ga mutane, ga mutane. , ga shari’a, ga nasara, ga shige da fice, ga asarar dukiya, ga cututtuka na gabas, ga albarka, ga kaburburan tsaunuka, ga falalar gabashi da yamma.
